类 SwingEuropeanChessDisplay

  • java.lang.Object
    • SwingEuropeanChessDisplay
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    SwingChessBoardDisplay

    public class SwingEuropeanChessDisplay
extends java.lang.Object
implements SwingChessBoardDisplay
    Rules for how we want a board to display for a game of European chess
    作者:
    Harold Connamacher, Bruce Dong

    • 方法详细资料

      • displayEmptySquare

        public void displayEmptySquare(javax.swing.JButton button,
                               int row,
                               int column)
        Display a square that has no piece on it. Will produce a red/black checkerboard.
        指定者:
        displayEmptySquare 在接口中 SwingChessBoardDisplay
        参数:
        button - the button that is used for the chessboard square
        row - the row of this square on the board
        column - the column of this square on the board

      • displayFilledSquare

        public void displayFilledSquare(javax.swing.JButton button,
                                int row,
                                int column,
                                ChessPiece piece)
        Display a square that has a piece on it.
        指定者:
        displayFilledSquare 在接口中 SwingChessBoardDisplay
        参数:
        button - the button that is used for the chessboard square
        row - the row of this square on the board
        column - the column of this square on the board
        piece - the piece that is on this square

      • highlightSquare

        public void highlightSquare(boolean highlight,
                            javax.swing.JButton button,
                            int row,
                            int column,
                            ChessPiece piece)
        Highlight a square of the board.
        指定者:
        highlightSquare 在接口中 SwingChessBoardDisplay
        参数:
        highlight - do we want the highlight on (true) or off (false)?
        button - the button that is used for the chessboard square
        row - the row of this square on the board
        column - the column of this square on the board
        piece - the piece (if any) that is on this square
